detail_desc: Trainers in canvas with a padded edge and tongue, lacing at the front, and imitation leather heel caps. Imitation leather linings, fabric insoles and patterned rubber soles.

Fully lined patterned bikini. Top with narrow, contrasting colour shoulder straps, a frill trim and decorative bows at the front. Bottoms with a contrasting colour trim at the top and a frill at the hems.
Jumper in a fine-knit silk and cotton blend with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Running shorts in fast-drying, breathable functional fabric with elastication and a concealed drawstring at the waist layered over a pair of short running tights that have a leg pocket. Reflective details. Key pocket with a concealed zip at the back. Size of key pocket approx. 9x20 cm. Size of leg pocket approx. 6x15 cm.
Cardigan in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with buttons down the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Mules with narrow, blunt toes and a decorative strap with a round buckle at the top. Imitation leather linings and insoles. Heel 0.5 cm.
Brazilian briefs in microfibre and lace with a low waist, lined gusset and half-string back.
Short, sleeveless top in a patterned viscose weave with a smocked back. Straight cut at the top with a halter neck, decorative buttons down the front and a small frill at the hem. Jersey lining.
Soft bandeau bras in jersey with decorative gathers at the front and a silicone trim at the top. Lined at the front.
Fitted, double-breasted jacket in a sturdy weave with notch lapels, welt front pockets, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined.
Tunic in woven fabric with a pleat at the front and bell-shaped hem. V-neck, dropped shoulders, yoke with a pleat at the back and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Slightly longer at the back.
Cardigan in a soft, fine knit with slits in the sides and no buttons.

Shirt jacket in a cotton weave with a lined, drawstring hood and long sleeves in sweatshirt fabric. Buttons down the front, flap chest pockets with a button, a yoke at the back and ribbing at the cuffs.
Satin-covered Alice band with a glittery appliqué in the shape of a candy cane on top.
Cotton canvas trainers with elasticated lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Knee-length skirt in airy chiffon with a high waist, box pleats at the top, a detachable tie belt, concealed zip at the back and diagonal side pockets. Lined.
Lined wellingtons with a loop at the back and chunky soles. Heel 2.2 cm.
Velour hooded top with a jersey-lined hood, kangaroo pocket and jersey ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved top in ribbed jersey made from a viscose and cotton blend with a ballerina neckline and overlocked edges at the cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved shirt in soft washed cotton twill with a small embroidered detail on the chest, buttoned cuffs and a contrasting colour on the inside of the collar stand and cuffs.
Captain's cap in woven fabric with metal buttons at the sides and a braided band at the front. Lined.
Short, off-the-shoulder blouse in woven fabric with a sweetheart neckline, lacing at the front, a concealed zip in one side and short puff sleeves with concealed elastication. Lined.
Sunglasses with metal frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Lace thong briefs with a low waist, lined gusset, narrow sides and string back.

department_name: Sneakers small girl inactive from s2
detail_desc: Trainers with a padded edge and tongue and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Slightly boxy cardigan in a soft rib knit containing some wool. Long sleeves, short slits in the sides and no fasteners.
Jeggings in washed, superstretch denim with a high waist, fake front pockets, real back pockets and skinny legs.
Playsuit in patterned jersey with narrow shoulder straps and decorative crossover straps at the back. Elasticated seam at the waist and short, wide legs.
Chelsea boots with elastic gores in the sides and a loop front and back. Canvas linings and insoles. Heel 3 cm.
Lace bra with underwired, padded cups that shape the bust and provide extra-firm support. Wide, adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Cotton jersey briefs in various designs with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.

Jacket in an airy cotton and linen weave with narrow notch lapels and buttons at the front. Long sleeves with decorative buttons at the cuffs, a small fake chest pocket, patch front pockets and a single back vent. Lined sleeves.
Calf-length pleated skirt in an airy weave covered in sequins. High waist with visible elasticated ribbing, and soft draping. Lined in airy jersey.
Pleated, calf-length skirt in woven fabric with a high, elasticated waist. Unlined.
5-pocket jeans in washed, superstretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and skinny legs.
Socks in a fine-knit cotton blend with a ribbed shaft.

Calf-length dress in lace with short, scalloped cap sleeves and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Concealed zip at the back, seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt with pleats at the top. Partly lined in a contrasting colour.

Shorts in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a high, elasticated, drawstring waist, pockets in the side seams and flap leg pockets with a tab and D-rings. The polyester content of the shorts is partly recycled.
Sleeveless, cropped top in textured-knit cotton with a V-neck and narrow shoulder straps.

Blouse woven in a Tencel™ lyocell blend with a sheen. Square neckline, concealed buttons down the front and short, voluminous puff sleeves with a flounce. Pleated bodice and sleeves for added volume, a tie belt at the waist and flared peplum.
Henley shirt in slub jersey with a button placket and long sleeves with a tab and button.

Lipstick bag in grained imitation leather with a detachable, metal chain shoulder strap and a metal decoration on the front. Concealed press-stud fastener and a mirror on the inside. Lined. Depth 3 cm. Height 3 cm. Width 8.5 cm.
Sleeveless dress in a softly draping weave with a collar, concealed buttons down the front, flap chest pockets and a drawstring at the waist.
Short coat in woven fabric with a zip down the front, pleat at the back and welt front pockets with a flap. Lined.
Calf-length A-line dress in an airy cotton weave with a frill-trimmed neckline and narrow shoulder straps. A seam below the hips and at the hem for added volume. Unlined.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with ribbing at the waist.
Super push-up bra in lace with underwired, thickly padded cups to maximise the bust and create a fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Leggings in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Top in soft jersey made from a cotton blend with a round neckline, embroidered flowers on the front and short, frill-trimmed sleeves. The cotton content of the top is organic.
A-line dress in airy seersucker with covered elastication at the top and shoulder straps with decorative ties.
Top in viscose crêpe jersey with a slightly wider neckline, short, flounced sleeves and short slits in the sides.

Jacket in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric with a detachable, lined hood, stand-up collar and zip down the front with a chin guard. Handwarmer pockets, flap front pockets with a press-stud, elastication at the cuffs and a single back vent. Reflective details. Lined. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a wide waistband to hold in and shape the waist. Regular waist with a concealed key pocket in the waistband.
Leotard in glossy jersey with decorative gathers at the top, crossover straps at the back and 3/4-length sleeves. Lined gusset.
High-waisted jeans in washed, superstretch denim with a zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and skinny legs.
T-shirt in soft jersey with a print motif on the front.
Set with two hair elastics and two hair clips decorated with tulle bows. Length of hair clips approx. 4 cm.
Jeggings in washed, superstretch denim with a high waist, fake front pockets, real back pockets and skinny legs.
Multi-strand metal necklace with a round pendant and chains in various designs. Adjustable length 40-48 cm.
Pyjamas in soft, printed cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top with ribbed cuffs. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Calf-length dress in an airy weave with a discreet textured pattern that tones with the fabric. V-neck, a sewn-in wrapover at the top, short, wide sleeves and a smocked seam at the waist. Unlined.
STUDIO COLLECTION. Padded jacket in a checked weave with a stand-up collar, zip down the front, zipped side pockets, an inner pocket and inner ribbing at the cuffs. Polyester filling. Lined.
Bucket hat in soft faux shearling with a woven cotton lining.

5-pocket jeans in washed, stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and button and skinny legs. Shaping – denim with a stretch function that holds in and shapes the waist, thighs and bum while keeping the jeans in shape.
Running shorts in a double layer of fast-drying functional fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and mesh key pocket in the waistband.
Tops in a cotton weave with covered elastic and gathers at the top and short, flounced sleeves.
V-neck T-shirts in soft jersey.
Baby Exclusive. Long-sleeved top in soft, organic cotton slub jersey with a button placket and open chest pocket.
Round-necked T-shirt in premium cotton jersey.
Short V-neck dress in sturdy satin with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a seam under the bust, concealed zip at the back and flared skirt. Lined.
Elasticated satin scrunchie.

Long dress in an airy Tencel™ lyocell and viscose weave with a V-neck, wrapover top and short, wide puff sleeves with smocking and flounced trims. Elasticated seam at the waist and a flared, voluminous skirt. Lined at the top and with a short skirt in airy jersey made from recycled polyester.
Striped shorts in a cotton weave containing glittery threads with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and fake welt back pockets.
Top in soft velour with a jersey-lined drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Hairbands in an airy weave. Can be worn around the head or a ponytail.
Twill cap with an appliqué on the front and an adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
Jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with a V-neck, low dropped shoulders with reverse-stitched seams, long sleeves and roll edges at the cuffs and hem. Longer at the back.
